item.title: 澳大利亚审慎监管机构打算取代银行的混合资本
item.description: 澳大利亚审慎监管机构周二建议用更可靠、成本更低的资本形式取代银行混合债券，因为散户投资者持有混合证券的比例不断上升，构成了金融稳定风险。【原文：Australia's prudential regulator proposed to replace bank hybrid bonds with more reliable and less expensive forms of capital on Tuesday, as rising ownership of hybrid securities among retail investors poses a financial stability risk.】

item.title: 华为发布三折智能手机，在中国与苹果展开竞争
item.description: 中国华为技术公司（HWT.UL）周二推出一款三向可折叠手机，力图凭借在中国市场大受欢迎的新外形设计，扩大其在全球最大智能手机市场对苹果的领先优势。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) unveils a three-way foldable phone on Tuesday, as it seeks to widen its lead over Apple in the world's biggest smartphone market with a new form factor that has gained popularity in the China market.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，关注美国通胀测试和美联储会议
item.description: 继华尔街隔夜大涨之后，亚洲股市周二扭转了早盘的跌势，小幅上扬，尽管对仍在挣扎的中国经济的担忧抑制了市场情绪。【原文：Asian stocks reversed early losses to rise marginally on Tuesday following Wall Street's overnight rally, though concerns about a still-struggling Chinese economy kept sentiment in check.】

item.title: 从秘鲁到图瓦卢：世界银行总裁称全球贷款人必须改变
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）周二在访问了从秘鲁到图瓦卢的 27 个国家后发表讲话说，在这个两极分化日益严重的世界，全球贷款机构需要加快工作速度并简化流程。【原文：World Bank President Ajay Banga said in a speech on Tuesday after visiting 27 countries from Peru to Tuvalu that the global lender needs to work faster and simplify its processes in a world experiencing greater polarisation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月就业前景恶化，企业经营状况创两年半新低
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，澳大利亚8月份的商业状况跌至两年半以来的最低点，就业前景受到打击，而有关通胀压力减弱的消息喜忧参半。【原文：Australian business conditions fell to the lowest in 2-1/2 years in August with the outlook for jobs taking a hit, a survey showed on Tuesday, while there was mixed news on inflation pressures subsiding.】

item.title: 弗朗辛风暴造成的供应中断抵消了需求疲软的影响，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 周二早盘，由于投资者权衡了热带风暴 "弗朗辛 "造成的供应中断和进一步减产的可能性，以及持续疲软的中国需求，石油价格持稳。【原文：Oil was steady in early trade on Tuesday as investors weighed supply disruptions from Tropical Storm Francine and the potential for further output cuts against persistently weak Chinese demand.】

item.title: 官员称波音劳资协议在投票前激怒了许多工会员工
item.description: 一位负责谈判的官员周一表示，波音公司与其最大的工会之一达成的一份临时劳动合同激怒了许多工人，他们希望获得更高的工资涨幅和更好的养老金。【原文：A tentative labor contract agreed between Boeing and one of its biggest unions has angered many workers who were hoping for higher wage hikes and better pensions, an official who negotiated the deal said on Monday.】

item.title: 三星 SDI 将以 8.36 亿美元向中国公司出售偏光片业务
item.description: 韩国电池制造商三星 SDI 周二表示，已决定以 1.12 万亿韩元（8.3647 亿美元）的价格将其偏光膜业务出售给中国无锡恒芯光电材料有限公司。【原文：South Korean battery maker Samsung SDI said on Tuesday it had decided to sell its polarizing film business to China's Wuxi Hengxin Optoelectronic Materials for 1.12 trillion won ($836.47 million).】

item.title: 美国众议院通过法案限制与中国药明康德和 BGI 的业务往来
item.description: 美国众议院周一通过了一项法案，旨在以国家安全为由限制与中国药明康德、BGI 和其他几家生物技术公司的业务往来。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives on Monday passed a bill that aims to restrict business with China's WuXi AppTec , BGI and several other biotech companies on national security grounds.】

item.title: 美国法院官员采取行动阻止债权人使 Citgo 拍卖脱轨
item.description: 一名负责监督委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖的美国联邦法院官员周一要求该案的法官阻止债权人提起更多诉讼，以免破坏销售进程。【原文：A U.S. federal court officer overseeing an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum on Monday asked the judge in the case to prevent creditors from pursuing additional lawsuits that could derail the sales process.】

item.title: 惠普为收购瞻博网络发行 13.5 亿美元可转换股票，股价下跌
item.description: 惠普企业（Hewlett Packard Enterprise）股价在盘后交易中下跌 6.4%，此前这家人工智能服务器制造商宣布发行 13.5 亿美元的强制可转换优先股，为收购瞻博网络（Juniper Networks）提供资金。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise's shares dropped 6.4% in extended trading after the AI server maker announced a $1.35 billion mandatory convertible preferred stock offering to fund its acquisition of Juniper Networks .】

item.title: 诉讼称特洁安避孕套含有 "永久性化学物质
item.description: 本周一的一项新诉讼声称，特洁安避孕套不安全，因为它们含有有毒的 "永久化学品"，而这种化学品与癌症有关。【原文：A new lawsuit on Monday claims that Trojan condoms are not safe because they contain toxic "forever chemicals," which have been linked to cancer.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称波音将供应商的 737 MAX 产量目标推迟 6 个月
item.description: 三位行业消息人士称，波音公司已告知供应商，将把其737 MAX的一个关键生产里程碑推迟六个月，这表明该飞机制造商正在努力提高其最畅销喷气式飞机的产量。【原文：Boeing Co has told suppliers it is delaying a key production milestone for its 737 MAX by six months, three industry sources said, in a sign the planemaker is struggling to boost production of its best-selling jet.】

item.title: 早间竞标中国贸易可能打破市场平静
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 因重组费用，Under Armour 2025 财年亏损扩大
item.description: 运动服制造商 Under Armour 周一表示，由于重组计划的相关费用高于预期，该公司 2025 财年的净亏损将更大。【原文：Sportswear maker Under Armour said on Monday it sees a bigger net loss in fiscal year 2025, due to higher-than-expected charges related to its restructuring plans.】

item.title: 美国众议院投票决定禁止中国制造商大疆创新（DJI）生产新型无人机
item.description: 美国众议院周一投票决定禁止中国无人机制造商大疆创新（DJI）的新型无人机在美国运营，这是立法者本周审议的一系列针对中国的措施之一。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives voted on Monday to bar new drones from Chinese drone manufacturer DJI from operating in the United States, one of a series of measures aimed at China that lawmakers are considering this week.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官称第三季度交易收入将下滑 10
item.description: 高盛首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周一表示，由于上个月的低迷状况，高盛第三季度的交易收入可能会下降 10%。【原文：Goldman Sachs' trading revenue will probably slip 10% in the third quarter because of sluggish conditions last month, its CEO David Solomon said on Monday.】

item.title: 新日铁反驳美国外国投资委员会反对其竞购美国钢铁公司的理由--信函
item.description: 据路透社首次报道，新日铁在一封措辞强硬的信中为其 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的交易进行了辩护，称这将加强美国钢铁业，而美国反对该交易的动机是政治因素。【原文：Nippon Steel defended its $14.9 billion bid for U.S. Steel , arguing it would strengthen the U.S. Steel industry and that politics are motivating the U.S. opposition to the deal, according to a strongly worded letter first reported by Reuters.】

item.title: 甲骨文云服务需求增长，季度收入超预期
item.description: 受部署人工智能的公司对甲骨文云产品需求增长的推动，甲骨文公司周一公布的第一季度营收超出预期。【原文：Oracle beat first-quarter revenue estimates on Monday, boosted by growing demand for its cloud offerings from companies deploying artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，诺福克南方公司首席执行官将在不当行为调查中下台
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，诺福克南方公司首席执行官艾伦-肖（Alan Shaw）预计将在对潜在不当行为指控的调查中卸任。【原文：Norfolk Southern's CEO Alan Shaw is expected to step down from his role amid an investigation into allegations of potential misconduct, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 礼来任命内部人士为财务总监，投资增加以提高产能
item.description: 美国制药商礼来公司周一表示，已任命内部人士卢卡斯-蒙塔斯（Lucas Montarce）为新任首席财务官，立即生效。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Eli Lilly on Monday said it has appointed insider Lucas Montarce as its new chief financial officer, effective immediately, months after former CFO Anat Ashkenazi stepped down to join Google parent Alphabet .】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 16 发布会：迄今为止的主要公告
item.description: 苹果公司周一发布了以人工智能为重点的 iPhone 16 系列、更时尚的 Apple Watch 和 AirPods 4，并表示将在下个月为其设备增加新的人工智能功能。【原文：Apple on Monday unveiled an artificial intelligence focused-iPhone 16 lineup, a sleeker Apple Watch, AirPods 4, and said new AI features will be added to its devices next month.】

item.title: 民调显示白宫选战激烈，特朗普媒体股价反弹
item.description: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普拥有多数股权的特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）周一股价大涨近 5%，因为一项民意调查显示，这位共和党候选人正在与副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）激烈角逐白宫席位。【原文：Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group , majority-owned by former U.S. President Donald Trump, jumped nearly 5% on Monday after a poll showed the Republican candidate is in a tight race against Vice President Kamala Harris for the White House.】

item.title: 研究显示，巴西的 Pix 在电子商务领域最快将于 2025 年超过信用卡
item.description: 巴西支付公司 Ebanx 周一发布的一份最新研究报告显示，巴西即时支付系统 Pix 最快将于明年超越信用卡，成为当地网购市场的领导者，这比最初的预期要早。【原文：Brazil's instant payment system Pix is seen surpassing credit cards as the leader in the local online purchase market as soon as next year, earlier than initially expected, a new study from Brazilian payments firm Ebanx showed on Monday.】

item.title: 美国联邦调查局称，2023 年加密货币诈骗造成的损失增长了 45
item.description: 美国联邦调查局（FBI）周一表示，由于骗子越来越多地利用数字资产交易的速度和不可逆转性，2023 年与加密货币相关的欺诈和诈骗造成的损失比 2022 年增加了 45%，总额超过 56 亿美元。【原文：Losses from cryptocurrency-related frauds and scams increased 45% in 2023 from 2022, totaling more than $5.6 billion, as scammers increasingly took advantage of the speed and irreversibility of digital asset transactions, the U.S. FBI said Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国银行聘请摩根大通的蒂姆-卡彭特（Tim Carpenter）共同领导软件投资银行业务
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周一透露，美国银行已从同业摩根大通聘请技术银行业务资深人士蒂姆-卡彭特（Tim Carpenter）共同领导其软件投资银行业务。【原文：Bank of America has hired technology banking veteran Tim Carpenter from peer JPMorgan Chase to co-lead its software investment banking business, a source familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 加拿大 Unifor 联合工会与通用汽车开始就 CAMI 装配厂进行合同谈判
item.description: 加拿大工会周一表示，通用汽车公司和 Unifor 已经开始为该公司位于安大略省的 CAMI 装配厂的工人进行集体谈判。【原文：General Motors and Unifor have begun collective bargaining for workers at the automaker's CAMI Assembly plant in Ontario, the Canadian labour union said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会不顾共和党反对批准新的审计质量基准
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构周一批准了一家监督机构制定的新会计准则，这是为解决普遍存在的审计质量低下问题所做努力的一部分。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator on Monday gave the nod to new accounting standards set by a watchdog agency, part of an effort to address concerns about the prevalence of poor quality audits.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命加西亚-萨拉斯和雷德蒙德负责中型企业投资银行业务
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通公司已聘请亨伯托-加西亚-萨拉斯（Humberto Garcia-Salas）和安德鲁-雷德蒙德（Andrew Redmond）担任中盘股投资银行部董事总经理，以进一步加强其投资银行部门。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co has hired Humberto Garcia-Salas and Andrew Redmond as managing directors for its Mid-Cap Investment Banking division, as it seeks to further strengthen its investment banking segment, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行：对冲基金投资者寻求股票策略新配置
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）的一项调查显示，养老基金、捐赠基金和家族办公室正计划在今年年底前进行新的股票对冲基金配置，因为该策略在2024年的行业表现中遥遥领先。【原文：Pension funds, endowments and family offices are planning to make new equity hedge funds allocations through the end of the year, a survey by BNP Paribas showed, as the strategy has led the industry performance in 2024.】
